name: The Flower of The Elmhearst
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 46 over the course of 72 hours, for the theme "Keep it alive"


You’ve been hired to work at a manor known as The Elmhearst and revive its dying courtyard.
But there is more to the courtyard than meets the eyes.
Shall you uncover the secrets of The Elmhearst?
Shall you save the garden?
And maybe will you find love?
